languages.text: Whenever wearers single ranged attack deals damage over 25% targets max HP it inflicts additional random condition to target (Blinded, Staggered or Slowed) for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Whenever wearers single ranged attack deals damage over 25% targets max HP it inflicts additional random condition to target (Blinded, Staggered or Slowed) for 1 round.

languages.text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer's single ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts blinded, staggered, or slowed on that target for 1 round.

Whenever the wearer's single ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts blinded, staggered, or slowed on that target for 1 round.

Whenever the wearer's single ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g}, {g|f:866cb491aeda45869e40a9165447a7cc}Staggered{/g}, or {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}blinded{/g}, {g|f:866cb491aeda45869e40a9165447a7cc}staggered{/g}, or {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

languages.text: Cuando un ataque a distancia de un solo disparo inflige daño igual al 25 % o más de las heridas máximas del objetivo, el ataque inflige uno de los siguientes efectos al azar durante 1 asalto: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un ataque a distancia de un solo disparo inflige daño igual al 25 % o más de las heridas máximas del objetivo, el ataque inflige uno de los siguientes efectos al azar durante 1 asalto: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者の単射範囲攻撃で、ターゲットの最大の傷の25%以上のダメージを与えるたび、この攻撃は1ラウンドの間、ターゲットにランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の単射範囲攻撃で、ターゲットの最大の傷の25%以上のダメージを与えるたび、この攻撃は1ラウンドの間、ターゲットにランダムに{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 当装备者的的单发远程攻击造成的伤害不低于目标最大生命值的25%时，此次攻击会随机对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果，持续一轮。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的的单发远程攻击造成的伤害不低于目标最大生命值的25%时，此次攻击会随机对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果，持续一轮。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'une attaque à distance au coup par coup inflige des dégâts égaux ou supérieurs à 25 % des blessures maximum de la cible, cette attaque lui applique aléatoirement {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'une attaque à distance au coup par coup inflige des dégâts égaux ou supérieurs à 25 % des blessures maximum de la cible, cette attaque lui applique aléatoirement {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Verursacht der Einzelschuss-Fernkampfangriff des Trägers mindestens 25 % der maximalen Wunden des Ziels, belegt dieser Angriff das Ziel zufällig 1 Runde lang mit {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelnd{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht der Einzelschuss-Fernkampfangriff des Trägers mindestens 25 % der maximalen Wunden des Ziels, belegt dieser Angriff das Ziel zufällig 1 Runde lang mit {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelnd{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}.

languages.text: Когда одиночная дальняя атака персонажа наносит урон, составляющий 25% от максимального здоровья цели или больше, эта атака накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 раунд (эффект выбирается случайным образом).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Когда одиночная дальняя атака персонажа наносит урон, составляющий 25% от максимального здоровья цели или больше, эта атака накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 раунд (эффект выбирается случайным образом).

Когда одиночная дальняя атака персонажа наносит урон, составляющий 25% от максимального здоровья цели или больше, эта атака накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g} на 1 раунд (эффект выбирается случайным образом).
